markdown: {{DisambigMsg|the quest|the [Paladin](/paladin/) passive|Iron Gut (passive)}} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [task](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsTasks/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis "Iron Gut" Pietro swallowed a valuable gemstone - Ngati's Black Tear - to avoid its theft, but now he's unable to pass it through his system. I've offered to help him "retrieve" the stone. ## Walkthrough * Talk to [Rosanella](/rosanella/) at the [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/) about a medicinal concoction that might help Pietro purge the gemstone he swallowed. She will provide a list of the ingredients for Ondra's Bile - a [Rotten Hagfish](/rottenHagfish/), an [Unripened Palm Stone](/unripenedPalmStone/), and a vial of [Fire Kelp Extract](/fireKelpExtract/). The stuff will keep him going from both ends for a week or two, but is guaranteed to work. ** The rotten hagfish can be found in one of the crates at [Lifter's Refuge](/liftersRefuge/). ** The unripened palm stone is sold by (or stolen from) a merchant, [Birna](/birna/) in [Radiant Court](/radiantCourt/). ** The fire kelp extract is sold by [Jacob Harker](/jacobHarker/) for {{cp2|250}} in [The King's Coffin](/theKingsCoffin/), you can also steal it from him. * Bring all of the ingredients to Pietro and make him throw them up. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/17_Dunnage/17_tsk_iron_gut.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Iron Gut''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Iron Gut Pietro swallowed a valuable gemstone - Ngati's Black Tear - to avoid its theft, but now he's unable to pass it through his system. I've offered to help him "retrieve" the stone. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Speak to Rosanella.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Talk to Rosanella at the Radiant Court about a medicinal concoction that might help Pietro purge the gemstone he swallowed. |- | rowspan="9" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Acquire the ingredients for Ondra's Bile.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Rosanella gave me a list of the ingredients for Ondra's Bile - a rotten hagfish, an unripened palm stone, and a vial of fire kelp extract. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I should look around Lifter's Refuge for any rotten hagfish. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | One of the merchants at the Radiant Court might have unripened palm stones for sale. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | Rosanella told me that I can purchase fire kelp extract from the King's Coffin. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | I acquired a rotten hagfish. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | I acquired an unripened palm stone. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | I acquired a vial of fire kelp extract. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20007 | Jacob Harker, owner of the King's Coffin in Dunnage sells fire kelp extract for 250 pires a bundle. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''3''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Iron Gut Pietro.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10003 | Bring the ingredients for Ondra's Bile to Pietro at the King's Coffin in Dunnage.
